title: Need4Fish
description: Need4Fish is a 3D race against the clock game where you play as a juvenile mosasaur trying to climb the food chain.

title: AI Bootcamp
description: This is a school assignment where we built a game AI agent to solve a set of puzzle maps.

title: N7WS
description: N7WS is a webapp made to monitor our school's computers and remotely run scripts.

title: Hagimule
description: A peer-to-peer download software developped in Java using RMI and socket connections.

title: Calculation model
description: A simple tool to create calculation scripts inspired by Unreal Engine's blueprint system.

title: Portfolio
description: This is the website you are currently browsing ! It is also the project I am currently working on.

title: N7 Studio
description: N7 Studio is a music composition software that we developped as a group project for school.

title: Minishell
description: Minishell is a basic implementation of a Unix shell with command execution, redirections, etc...

title: PC build
description: I built my own desktop computer and keyboard after researching and sourcing the necessary components.
